title: 軽い言葉じゃ意味がねえ

text.jpText:
イナリワンはテレビの取材で『次の目標は
ジャパンダートダービー』と宣言。放送時に
意外だと言われてしまう。
text.enText:
Inari One declared in a TV interview, "My 
next target is the Japan Dirt Derby. During 
the broadcast It is said to be unexpected.

text.jpText:
さらに記者たちは大井に行き、転入前の
イナリワンを指導していた親方を取材――
text.enText:
The reporters also went to Oi to interview 
the master who had been teaching Inari One 
before she moved to Oi.

text.jpText:
イナリワンが最終的に目指すものと、
地方のレースを制覇したい理由が伝わって
いないためか、親方を怒らせてしまう。
text.enText:
Inari One's ultimate goal and the reason why 
she wants to conquer the local races are not 
communicated. Perhaps because she does not 
understand what Inari One's ultimate goal is 
and why she wants to win local races, she 
angers her master.

text.jpText:
だがイナリワンは、覚悟は実績で示すと言い、
弁解しようとしない。本当にこれでよいのか、
トレーナーは不安を覚えるのだった。
text.enText:
Inari One, however, refuses to make excuses, 
saying that her resolve is demonstrated by 
her accomplishments. The trainer was 
concerned about whether this was really the 
right thing to do. The trainer felt uneasy.
